nodes.text: Greater Xnapolis was a city located on the world Mrinzebon. The city was somewhat profitable during the reign of the Galactic Empire, however, shortly after the Battle of Endor, the Empire abandoned the city and Mrinzebon. Immediately, riots and looting began. The city was mostly lawless but did not quite fall to anarchy. A local gang rose to power in the town, led by Vryant, a former Imperial who had stayed behind on the planet.
